1.title: About
1.content: This website contains the course notes for COS 324 - Introduction to Machine Learning at Princeton University. The notes were prepared by professors Sanjeev Arora, Danqi Chen and undergraduates Simon Park, and Dennis Jacob.

4.title: Supervised Learning
4.content: Ch 1 Linear Regression: An Introduction Ch 2 Statistical Learning: What It Means to Learn Ch 3 Optimization via Gradient Descent Ch 4 Linear Classification Ch 5 Exploring “Data Science” via Linear Regression

5.title: Unsupervised Learning
5.content: Ch 6 Clustering Ch 7 Low-Dimensional Representation Ch 8 n-Gram Language Models Ch 9 Matrix Factorization and Recommender Systems

6.title: Deep Learning
6.content: Ch 10 Introduction to Deep Learning Ch 11 Feedforward Neural Network and Backpropagation Ch 12 Convolutional Neural Network

7.title: Reinforcement Learning
7.content: Ch 13 Introduction to Reinforcement Learning Ch 14 Markov Decision Process Ch 15 Reinforcement Learning in Unknown Environment

8.title: Advanced Topics
8.content: Ch 16 Machine Learning and Ethics Ch 17 Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing

9.title: Mathematics for Machine Learning
9.content: Ch 18 Probability and Statistics Ch 19 Calculus Ch 20 Linear Algebra This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 2.0 Generic License .

11.title: Authors
11.content: Danqi Chen . danqic 'at' cs 'dot' princeton 'dot' edu . Dennis Jacob . djacob 'at' princeton 'dot' edu . Sanjeev Arora . arora 'at' cs 'dot' princeton 'dot' edu . Simon Park . juhyunp 'at' princeton 'dot' edu .
